cards.name: Colossal Stomp
cards.rulesText: Deal 8 damage to an adjacent enemy and push it 3 squares.

cards.name: Thunderous Roar
cards.rulesText: All enemies within 4 squares take 4 damage and are Stunned.

cards.name: Mountain-Sized Tail Swipe
cards.rulesText: Deal 5 damage to one enemy and pull it 4 squares toward you.

cards.name: Ancient Regeneration
cards.rulesText: Heal yourself 6 HP and gain Regenerating for 2 rounds.

cards.name: Unmovable Presence
cards.rulesText: Until your next turn you cannot be pushed or pulled; enemies that enter within 2 squares are Immobilized.

cards.name: Titanic Charge
cards.rulesText: Move 3 squares in a straight line; deal 5 damage to each enemy crossed.

cards.name: Devastating Rampage
cards.rulesText: Make a basic melee attack against every enemy within 2 squares.

cards.name: Crushing Bite
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to one enemy and gain Focused twice.

cards.name: Titanic Recovery
cards.rulesText: Remove all negative conditions from yourself and heal 4 HP.

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage and push all enemies within 3 squares back 3.

cards.name: Cataclysmic Whirlwind
cards.rulesText: Move 5 squares in a straight line; each enemy crossed takes 4 damage and is Knocked Down.

cards.name: Volcanic Breath
cards.rulesText: Line 8: deal 9 damage; targets hit are Blinded and gain Bleeding.

cards.name: Titanic Smash
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage and swap places with the target; all adjacent enemies take 2 damage.
